name: Explorer (Pol Sobrepera)
description:
Explorer is a game about exploration and adventure, combinig "Where's Wally?" and "Pokémon Snap".

You explore different biomes and animals, and as you discover new animals you get information about them (Name, native range, diet...) with the final objective of getting all the animals information.

CONTROLS

You move with WASD

Take and untake photos with left click
